text: 7:10 2 Samuel 12:13; Aghuzir Akaba 17:22; Matyu 26:75; 27:3-5; Hibru 12:16-17E fo, Godɨn otivir osɨmtɨziba ko aghumsɨzir araziba, da gumazamizibagh amima, me uan navibagh iraghɨrasi. Arazir kamɨn God uam en akura. Kamaghɨn, e arazir kam bagh uan navibagh isɨn nɨghnɨzir avɨribara amuan markiam. Ezɨ nguazir kamɨn osɨmtɨziba ko aghumsɨzir araziba, da gumazamizibagh amima ovevem otifi.
